description: This file sets up server-side request handling for a Remix application, including handling of bot detection, response streaming, and CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, distinguishes between bot and browser requests, and delegates to appropriate handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot user agents using stream rendering.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser user agents using stream rendering.
